mapper.select: select a.id, a.article_user_id, a.article_title, a.article_view_count, a.article_comment_count, a.article_like_count, a.article_is_comment, a.article_status, a.article_order, a.article_summary, a.create_time, a.update_time from article a left join article_tag_ref atr on a.id = atr.article_id where atr.tag_id = #{tagId}
